idea: Quantazis® is an emerging IT company that has expertise in all the latest advancements in the IT sector. A highly dedicated team of employees make up the company and are able to achieve maximum customer satisfaction. The company is well-versed and provides ideal IT services like Cybersecurity, Cloud, Digital Synergy, and Enterprise Application Development, which ensures the upliftment of a business. The company helps clients transform their organizations; enabling holistic digital strategies to catch up with consumer demands, and ultimately, developing technology operating models that make organizations more agile.
name: QUANTAZIS TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Groei (pronounced ’grow’) Enterprises is a brand new entrant into the ‘grow’ing field of household and personal cleaning agents, both home-purposed as well as corporate offices.

Our manufacturing unit is based in Thane, Maharashtra, and sells under the brand name Glowr .

Currently, we offer Herbal products, Floor Cleaner, Laundry Wash Liquid, Hand-wash, Dish Wash and All Surface Cleaner, using only natural extracts of Neem, Aloevera, Reetha, Tulsi, Rose petals, Lemon grass, Citronella and Peppermint,

 leaving your homes and offices not just sparklingly clean, but pleasantly perfumed.
name: Groei Enterprises

idea: At INFINITY FOILS AND CONTAINERS PRIVATE LIMITED, We make aluminium foils, containers and products. Infinity foils & containers conversion capabilities include printing, laminating, embossing, coating, sheeting, cutting, slitting, and punching.
name: INFINITY FOILS AND CONTAINERS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: KALINGA CODE IS A STEM BASED DESIGN-TECH STUDIO. WE MAKE ART THROUGH CODE AND ALGORITHMS. WE CREATE PERSONALIZED ART THROUGH CODE. WE ALSO DO ADAPTIVE BRANDING. IN NEAR FUTURE WE HOPE TO VENTURE INTO INTERACTIVE ART INSTALLATIONS.
name: KALINGA CODE

idea:
MeraLegal.com is India`s fastest platform for Business taxation & registration. Register Company, GST, FSSAI, Trademark Rst, Shop Act, MSME, IEC, Trade license.

Your Trusted Partner for Startup Legalities.

We handle your messy legalities and documentation, so that you worry less and focus more on your dream business.

Our Services :

1. Company Registration

2. ROC Filing

3. ISO Certification

4. Closure of Company

5. Trademark Registration

6. GST Registration

7. MSME Registration

8. Free Legal Agreements

We also help with marriage registration and accounting services. We offer customised services to match the requirement of different clients.
name: MeraLegal.Com
